vote.title: Authorize the purchase of a portable barricading system for the Police Department with Security 20/20, Inc. dba Security Pro USA through the General Services Administration cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $99,895 - Financing:  U.S. Department of Homeland Security Grant Funds
